details.title: Passive bistatic synthetic aperture radar imaging with Galileo transmitters and a moving receiver: experimental demonstration

kwd: passive bistatic synthetic aperture radar imaging

authors.affiliation: Sch. of Electron., Electr. & Comput. Eng., Univ. of Birmingham, Birmingham, UK
authors.name: Michail Antoniou

authors.affiliation: Beijing Radar Res. Inst., Beijing, China
authors.name: Zhou Hong

authors.affiliation: Sch. of Electron., Electr. & Comput. Eng., Univ. of Birmingham, Birmingham, UK
authors.name: Mikhail Cherniakov

details.abstract: This study discusses experimental methods and results on passive bistatic synthetic aperture radar using navigation satellites as transmitters of opportunity and a moving receiver. The article highlights practical issues in imaging. Experimental imagery obtained using Galileo satellite emissions and a receiver onboard a ground moving vehicle confirm the system technical feasibility as well as some of its major theoretically predicted parameters.

ieee.title: Passive GNSS-Based SAR Resolution Improvement Using Joint Galileo E5 Signals
ieee.displayText: Hui Ma, Michail Antoniou, Mikhail Cherniakov, "Passive GNSS-Based SAR Resolution Improvement Using Joint Galileo E5 Signals", Geoscience and Remote Sensing Letters IEEE, vol. 12, pp. 1640-1644, 2015, ISSN 1545-598X.

ieee.title: Space-Surface Bistatic SAR Image Enhancement Based on Repeat-Pass Coherent Fusion With Beidou-2/Compass-2 as Illuminators
ieee.displayText: Tao Zeng, Tian Zhang, Weiming Tian, Cheng Hu, "Space-Surface Bistatic SAR Image Enhancement Based on Repeat-Pass Coherent Fusion With Beidou-2/Compass-2 as Illuminators", Geoscience and Remote Sensing Letters IEEE, vol. 13, pp. 1832-1836, 2016, ISSN 1545-598X.

ieee.title: Spatial Decorrelation in GNSS-Based SAR Coherent Change Detection
ieee.displayText: Qilei Zhang, Michail Antoniou, Wenge Chang, Mikhail Cherniakov, "Spatial Decorrelation in GNSS-Based SAR Coherent Change Detection", Geoscience and Remote Sensing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 53, pp. 219-228, 2015, ISSN 0196-2892.

ieee.title: Spatial Resolution Improvement in GNSS-Based SAR Using Multistatic Acquisitions and Feature Extraction
ieee.displayText: Fabrizio Santi, Marta Bucciarelli, Debora Pastina, Michail Antoniou, Mikhail Cherniakov, "Spatial Resolution Improvement in GNSS-Based SAR Using Multistatic Acquisitions and Feature Extraction", Geoscience and Remote Sensing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 54, pp. 6217-6231, 2016, ISSN 0196-2892.
